title: Dinnerbone：新公寓
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zx728925 于 2016-8-6 11:28 编辑 

Dinnerbone：our new apartment is a furnace because of constant sunlight, so it's scarily hot here even when it's cooled off outside :(
Dinnerbone：我们的新公寓就像火炉一样，因为外面持续的阳光，所以有时即使是外面凉快了一点，但里面还是非常的热。
